article_title: Hillary Clinton's Economic Intervention Agenda Unveiled

article_metadata.description: In her major New School speech outlining her economic agenda, Hillary Clinton had a lot to say about jobs and higher incomes for Americans, but not much about what matters to those expected to provide them. Hiring and business startups are suffering, fewer are self employed. Any politician concerned about jobs would first [...]
article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.
